directions: In a large stock pot, brown beef and onion.  Cook until onion is tender, and drain any grease.  Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Stir in stewed tomatoes, vegetables, egg noodles and oregano.  Bring to a boil; reduce heat, cover and simmer for 15 minutes, or until noodles are tender.  Serve hot.
title: Quick and Zesty Vegetable Soup
